verses.verse: Praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my soul! <S%H5315><s%> All that is within <S%H7130><s%> me, <S%H6944><s%> praise his holy name! <S%H8034><s%>
Praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and don't <S%H7911><s%> forget all his benefits; <S%H1576><s%>
who forgives <S%H5545><s%> all your sins; <S%H5771><s%> who heals <S%H7495><s%> all your diseases; <S%H8463><s%>
who redeems <S%H1350><s%> your life <S%H2416><s%> from destruction; <S%H7845><s%> who crowns <S%H5849><s%> you with loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and tender mercies; <S%H7356><s%>
who satisfies <S%H7646><s%> your desire <S%H5716><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%> things, <S%H5271><s%> so that your youth is renewed <S%H2318><s%> like the eagle <S%H5404><s%>'s.
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> executes <S%H6213><s%> righteous <S%H6666><s%> acts, <S%H4941><s%> and justice for all who are oppressed. <S%H6231><s%>
He made known <S%H3045><s%> his ways <S%H1870><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> his deeds <S%H5949><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious, <S%H2587><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%>
He will not always <S%H5331><s%> accuse; <S%H7378><s%> neither will he stay <S%H5201><s%> angry forever. <S%H5769><s%>
He has not dealt <S%H6213><s%> with us according to our sins, <S%H2399><s%> nor repaid <S%H1580><s%> us for our iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>
For as the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are high above <S%H1361><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> so great <S%H1396><s%> is his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> toward those who fear him. <S%H3373><s%>
As far as <S%H7368><s%> the east <S%H4217><s%> is from the west, <S%H4628><s%> so far has he removed <S%H7368><s%> our transgressions from us. <S%H6588><s%>
Like a father <S%H1><s%> has compassion <S%H7355><s%> on his children, <S%H1121><s%> so Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has compassion <S%H7355><s%> on those who fear him. <S%H3373><s%>
For he knows <S%H3045><s%> how we are made. <S%H3336><s%> He remembers <S%H2142><s%> that we are dust. <S%H6083><s%>
As for man, <S%H582><s%> his days <S%H3117><s%> are like grass. <S%H2682><s%> As a flower <S%H6731><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> so he flourishes. <S%H6692><s%>
For the wind <S%H7307><s%> passes over <S%H5674><s%> it, <S%H4725><s%> and it is gone. Its place remembers it no more. <S%H5234><s%>

But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> is from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> everlasting <S%H5769><s%> with those who fear <S%H3373><s%> him, <S%H6666><s%> his righteousness to children <S%H1121><s%>'s children; <S%H1121><s%>
to those who keep <S%H8104><s%> his covenant, <S%H1285><s%> to those who remember <S%H2142><s%> to obey <S%H6213><s%> his precepts. <S%H6490><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has established <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> in the heavens. <S%H8064><s%> His kingdom <S%H4438><s%> rules over all. <S%H4910><s%>

Praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you angels <S%H4397><s%> of his, <S%H1368><s%> who are mighty in strength, <S%H3581><s%> who fulfill <S%H6213><s%> his word, <S%H1697><s%> obeying <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his word. <S%H1697><s%>
Praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all you armies <S%H6635><s%> of his, <S%H8334><s%> you servants of his, <S%H6213><s%> who do his pleasure. <S%H7522><s%>

Praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all you works <S%H4639><s%> of his, <S%H4725><s%> in all places of his dominion. <S%H4475><s%> Praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my soul! <S%H5315><s%>
